caption: Next to a bonfire, a group of people is gathered, conducting some ritual. A man is tied to a pole, and the tribal chief is furious, whipping him. Then, he shows great gentleness toward another person and embraces his wife. He delivers an impassioned speech, moving energetically, displaying both valor and anger. He appears determined to do something significant and is simultaneously whipping the person on the table. The people around are excited, cheering for him and applauding.In another place, a man is walking, but he is suddenly stopped.
